projects.project_desc:
Field force automation is an website used by Field engineers(FEs)/Remote engineers(REs).
This website helps in connecting to the hospital devices which are hosted in the hospital network.
Functions such as health check of the device, updating a licence, downloading/uploading a file to the device and various other tools help in performing seemless operations on the hospital device

roles_and_responsibilities.Understanding Requirements: Collaborate with stakeholders, including business analysts and product owners, to understand project requirements and user needs

roles_and_responsibilities.Front-End Development (Angular):
Design and develop responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using Angular.
Implement and maintain Angular components, services, and directives.
Ensure a seamless user experience by optimizing the performance of Angular applications

roles_and_responsibilities.Back-End Development (Spring Boot):
Develop robust and scalable server-side logic using Spring Boot.
Implement RESTful APIs and integrate them with the front-end components.
Work on data modeling, database design, and integration with databases (e.g., Oracle)

roles_and_responsibilities.Full Stack Integration:
Collaborate with the back-end and front-end teams to integrate Angular with Spring Boot.
Ensure data consistency and efficient communication between the front-end and back-end components.

roles_and_responsibilities.Code Versioning and Collaboration:
Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage and collaborate on codebase changes.
Collaborate with other developers, testers, and cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project delivery

roles_and_responsibilities.Testing:
Write unit tests for both front-end and back-end components.
Perform integration testing to ensure the entire application works seamlessly.

roles_and_responsibilities.Security:
Implement and adhere to security best practices for both front-end and back-end development.
Ensure data security, authentication, and authorization mechanisms are in place.

roles_and_responsibilities.Performance Optimization:
Identify and address performance bottlenecks in both Angular and Spring Boot components.
Optimize code and queries for better application performance.

roles_and_responsibilities.Documentation:
Create and maintain technical documentation for code, APIs, and system architecture.
Provide documentation for fellow developers and other stakeholders.

roles_and_responsibilities.Continuous Learning:
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in Java, Angular, and related frameworks.
Actively participate in knowledge-sharing sessions within the team.

roles_and_responsibilities.Troubleshooting and Debugging:
Diagnose and resolve issues in both front-end and back-end components.
Perform debugging and troubleshooting to identify and fix bugs.

roles_and_responsibilities.Deployment and DevOps:
Collaborate with DevOps teams for deployment automation.
Work with containerization tools (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes) if applicable.

roles_and_responsibilities.Code Reviews: Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, adherence to coding standards, and knowledge sharing within the team.
